Articles.Content:
I was just wondering, is it possible for an engine to have a diffuse texture with a bumped map and emissive at the same time? So far I have not added emission to my engine nozzles. I only see 2 slots designated for textures in Unity. Is there a way to add a third slot? How does one go about doing this?

Thank you :) Edited November 26, 2015 by fairy

Yes it is possible. You just need to use the KSP emissive bumped shader. You can even use the one that adds specular on top of all that.


Edit: [IMG]http://lacroixdidier.com/temp/KSPShader.jpg[/IMG]

Of course this requires part tool. Edited November 26, 2015 by Nookos

Oh ok, nice. I've been so comfortable using normal bumped and diffuse that I didn't even see there was an option for emissiveBumped.

Thanks :)
